installation\/index.md.Jeedom peut être installé sur différents: Jeedom can be installed on different hardware components
installation\/index.md.tout système Linux basé sur Debian 10 (B: any Linux system based on Debian 10 (Buster
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez aussi acheter une box toute: You can also buy a ready-made box with Jeedom preinstalled which also contains a service pack (more support and services) and free plugins
installation\/index.md.En montage DIY (Do It Yourself), voici u: In DIY assembly (Do It Yourself), here is a "typical" configuration to get started with Jeedom in Z-Wave
installation\/index.md.Soit un total de 125 € pour une box domo: That is a total of 125 € for an open source home automation box with complete control of its installation
installation\/index.md.Il est possible d'ajouter ou de changer: It is possible to add or change by an Rfxcom antenna, or an enOcean key, etc
installation\/index.md.En principe, il vous faut une clef USB p: In principle, you need a USB key per additional protocol
installation\/index.md.En fonction de leur nombre et de leur co: Depending on their number and their cumulative consumption, on a Raspberry Pi you may need an additional USB hub with its dedicated power supply
installation\/index.md.Pour la clef Z-Wave Aeotec Gen 5 en util: For the Z-Wave Aeotec Gen 5 key in combined use with a Raspberry Pi 4 (previous models not concerned), you must use a recent one if you want to get rid of a USB hub
installation\/index.md.Se renseigner et se fournir chez un vend: Inquire and obtain supplies from a home automation equipment seller
installation\/index.md.Sur RPi 4, il est vivement conseillé de: On RPi 4, it is strongly recommended to replace the microSD card with an mSATA USB3 hard drive, directly connected to the USB3 port with native boot
installation\/index.md.Les cartes microSD ont une durée de vie: MicroSD cards have a very limited lifespan in intensive data exchange
installation\/index.md.à ne réserver que pour de courtes périod: to be reserved only for short test periods
installation\/index.md.et peuvent avoir besoin d'une connexion: and may need an internet connection
installation\/index.md.Jeedom est un logiciel qui est et rester: Jeedom is software that is and will remain open source, its use is completely free and does not depend on a cloud or a subscription
installation\/index.md.Cependant, certains plugins qui permette: However, some plugins that increase the capabilities of Jeedom or its use may be chargeable
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez retrouver la liste des plugi: You can find the list of plugins
installation\/index.md.Nous ne recommandons pas ce mode d'insta: We do not recommend this installation mode which makes the use of certain equipment complicated because of Docker's network mode
installation\/index.md.Une fois l'installation faite, n'oubliez: Once the installation is done, do not forget to consult the documentation

installation\/mini.md.Le nom de l'image Jeedom peut être diffé: The name of the Jeedom image may be different from that of the captures made in this documentation

installation\/mini.md.Insérez votre carte SD dans votre ordina: Insert your SD card in your computer then launch the Etcher software, give it the path of the image, the path of the SD card and click on "Flash
installation\/mini.md.Le logiciel va graver la carte SD et vér: The software will burn the SD card and verify the burning
installation\/mini.md.Vous n'avez plus qu'à mettre la carte SD: You just have to put the SD card in the Jeedomboard (or Hummingboard), connect the network and the power supply, your Jeedom will start (5 min) and you should see it on the network

installation\/rpi.md.Il faut donc l'activer: So you have to activate it

installation\/rpi.md.nouveau \/ document texte et le renommer: new / text document and rename it to "ssh
installation\/rpi.md.Sous Windows, dans l'explorateur, il fau: Under Windows, in the explorer, you must therefore check your settings in display / options / modify folder and search options /

installation\/rpi.md.Il faut connaître l'adresse Ip de votre: You need to know the IP address of your Raspberry PI. Many solutions

installation\/rpi.md.Rentrez l'adresse IP de votre Raspberry: Enter the IP address of your Raspberry Pi (here 192.168.0

installation\/rpi.md.Le mot de passe sudo est également raspb: The sudo password is also raspberry

installation\/rpi.md.A défaut, il faudra reprendre la totalit: Otherwise, you will have to repeat the entire procedure
installation\/rpi.md.Les arguments suivants sont utilisables: The following arguments can be used
installation\/rpi.md.w = dossier webserver -z = installation: w = webserver folder -z = install z-wave dependencies -m = desired mysql root password
installation\/rpi.md.Si vous utilisez votre Raspberry Pi pour: If you use your Raspberry Pi for Jeedom without a screen connected, it is recommended to allocate the minimum RAM to the video part

installation\/vm.md.Si vous voulez découvrir Jeedom sans ris: If you want to discover Jeedom without risk, you can also virtualize it on your PC, here is the procedure to follow

installation\/vm.md.Cliquez sur nouvelle et renseignez les c: Click on new and fill in the fields as below

installation\/vm.md.Selectionnez \"Install on disk\" (touche: Select "Install on disk" (keyboard enter key), validate with yes (down arrow key then enter
installation\/vm.md.Toute la suite va se faire automatiqueme: All the rest will be done automatically (10 to 30min), then once the vm restarted waiting 5min and you should have access to Jeedom by simply putting the jeedom ip in a browser
